title: Why Are 31% of Companies Overhauling Their Wellness Programs Right Now?
description:
Why Are 31% of Companies Overhauling Their Wellness Programs Right Now?

Aon research reveals what forward-thinking companies already know: employee wellbeing directly drives performance through three key channels.
-Cost Optimization - Healthier employees = fewer claims, less absenteeism, lower turnover 
-Employee Engagement - Better wellbeing creates more productive, committed teams
-Performance Analytics - Tracking wellbeing helps identify root causes of productivity issues

But here's what most corporate programs miss: the fundamentals that actually move the needle.

The Real ROI Drivers:
üèãÔ∏è Strength Training
üò¥ Quality Sleep
ü´Å Stress-Regulating Breathwork
ü•ó Nutrient-Dense Nutrition
‚òÄÔ∏è Strategic Sunlight

The fundamentals aren't glamorous, but they're what separate sustainable high performers from those running on borrowed energy.

Your nervous system doesn't care about your title‚Äîit responds to how you treat it.

Which fundamental needs the most attention in your daily routine?

#ExecutiveWellness #CorporateWellbeing #SustainablePerformance #Leadership #HighPerformance
